已过时的 API

目录

  • 类
  • 枚举
  • 方法
  • 构造器
  • 类 
    类 说明
    org.elasticsearch.client.migration.IndexUpgradeInfoRequest
    Use the Deprecation Info API, which uses DeprecationInfoRequest instead.
    org.elasticsearch.client.migration.IndexUpgradeInfoResponse
    Use the Deprecation Info API which returns DeprecationInfoResponse instead.
    org.elasticsearch.client.migration.IndexUpgradeRequest
    The Migration Upgrade API is deprecated, use the Kibana Upgrade Assistant or Reindex API instead.
    org.elasticsearch.client.security.EmptyResponse
    Use a boolean instead of this class
  • 枚举 
    枚举 说明
    org.elasticsearch.client.migration.UpgradeActionRequired
    The Migration Assistance API is deprecated, use the Deprecation Info API instead.
  • 方法 
    方法 说明
    org.elasticsearch.client.ClusterClient.putSettings​(ClusterUpdateSettingsRequest, Header...)
    Prefer ClusterClient.putSettings(ClusterUpdateSettingsRequest, RequestOptions)
    org.elasticsearch.client.ClusterClient.putSettingsAsync​(ClusterUpdateSettingsRequest, ActionListener<ClusterUpdateSettingsResponse>, Header...)
    Prefer ClusterClient.putSettingsAsync(ClusterUpdateSettingsRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener)
    org.elasticsearch.client.core.CountRequest.types​(String...)
    Types are going away, prefer filtering on a type.
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.clearCache​(ClearIndicesCacheRequest, Header...)
    Prefer IndicesClient.clearCache(ClearIndicesCacheRequest, RequestOptions)

    Prefer IndicesClient.close(CloseIndexRequest, RequestOptions)
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.closeAsync​(CloseIndexRequest, ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse>, Header...)
    Prefer IndicesClient.closeAsync(CloseIndexRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener)
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.create​(CreateIndexRequest, Header...)
    This method uses an old request object which still refers to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.create(CreateIndexRequest, RequestOptions) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object and also uses request options instead of headers.
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.createAsync​(CreateIndexRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener<CreateIndexResponse>)
    This method uses an old request object which still refers to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.createAsync(CreateIndexRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.delete​(DeleteIndexRequest, Header...)
    Prefer IndicesClient.delete(DeleteIndexRequest, RequestOptions)
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.deleteAsync​(DeleteIndexRequest, ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse>, Header...)
    Prefer IndicesClient.deleteAsync(DeleteIndexRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener)
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.exists​(GetIndexRequest, RequestOptions)
    This method uses an old request object which still refers to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.exists(GetIndexRequest, RequestOptions) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.existsAlias​(GetAliasesRequest, Header...)
    Prefer IndicesClient.existsAlias(GetAliasesRequest, RequestOptions)

    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.getAsync​(GetIndexRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener<GetIndexResponse>)
    This method uses an old request object which still refers to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.getAsync(GetIndexRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.getFieldMapping​(GetFieldMappingsRequest, RequestOptions)
    This method uses old request and response objects which still refer to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.getFieldMapping(GetFieldMappingsRequest, RequestOptions) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.

    This method uses old request and response objects which still refer to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.getFieldMappingAsync(GetFieldMappingsRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.

    This method uses old request and response objects which still refer to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.getMapping(GetMappingsRequest, RequestOptions) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.

    This method uses old request and response objects which still refer to types, a deprecated feature. The method IndicesClient.getMapping(GetMappingsRequest, RequestOptions) should be used instead, which accepts a new request object.

    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.putMapping​(PutMappingRequest, Header...)

    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.putTemplate​(PutIndexTemplateRequest, RequestOptions)
    This old form of request allows types in mappings. Use IndicesClient.putTemplate(PutIndexTemplateRequest, RequestOptions) instead which introduces a new request object without types.
    org.elasticsearch.client.IndicesClient.putTemplateAsync​(PutIndexTemplateRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse>)
    This old form of request allows types in mappings. Use IndicesClient.putTemplateAsync(PutIndexTemplateRequest, RequestOptions, ActionListener) instead which introduces a new request object without types.

    构造器 说明
    org.elasticsearch.client.security.PutUserRequest​(User, char[], boolean, RefreshPolicy)
    Use PutUserRequest.withPassword(User, char[], boolean, RefreshPolicy) or PutUserRequest.updateUser(User, boolean, RefreshPolicy) instead.
